ComicInfo.Title: Threat Matrix 1 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
COBRA TAKES MANHATTAN! It was inevitable once the G.I. JOE team relocated that COBRA COMMANDER would put the Big Apple squarely in his sights-and now THE MAD MONK is in charge. But the BARONESS and DESTRO are cooking up some schemes of their own... the question is: will those schemes make them allies to DUKE and company?
Note: Snake-Eyes does not appear in this issue or the cover, but is Quick-Kick in disguise.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 12:53:21. [CVDB423696]
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Beachhead, Cover Girl, Destro, Doc, Duke, General Colton, Hashtag, Iron Grenadiers, Mad Monk, Mainframe, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Scarlett, Sgt. Savage, Shipwreck, Stalker, Tunnel Rat
ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, G.I. Joe, Iron Army, United States Army
ComicInfo.Locations: Fort Jay, Manhattan, New York City, New York State, North America, Scotland, Statue of Liberty
